posts.title: Pizza Slice Night Light
posts.content: If you can’t stop dreaming about the cheesy stuff, this pizza slice night light is just for you. This cheese covered slice sits atop a paper plate styled base and comes with a simple on/off switch for added convenience.

posts.title: Light Up Tent Stakes
posts.content: Minimize nighttime accidents when walking around the campgrounds by setting up your shelter using these light up tent stakes. They’re made from durable aluminum and come with 18 lumen LEDs that stay lit for up to 10 hours of continuous use.

posts.title: G.I. Joe Cologne
posts.content: Hit the streets smelling like a real American hero by using this G.I. Joe cologne. Inspired by the troops and veterans who have bravely served, it features a unique woodsy scent and comes in a cool canteen styled bottle covered with a military grade canvas pouch.

posts.title: LEGO Builder’s Guide Book
posts.content: Become the ultimate builder in LEGO history by learning the ins and outs of the trade from this LEGO Builder’s Guide book. You’ll learn everything from how to construct models that won’t fall apart to how to create photo mosaics and curved sculptures.

posts.title: Game Of Thrones Tarot Cards
posts.content: Find a rich and meaningful path to divination by using these Game of Thrones tarot cards. They feature exquisite artwork that depicts the series’ characters, scenes, and stories in a style that’s true to the world of dragons and gratuitous nudity.

posts.title: Hardwood Cleaning Robot
posts.content: Keep your home’s charming wooden floors looking springtime clean all year round with the hardwood cleaning robot. This compact robot roves about your home using specialized cloths designed to leave the floors squeaky clean without scratching the wood.

posts.title: Stand Up Paddleboard Pet Traction Mat
posts.content: Help your four legged friend catch the ride of a lifetime by equipping your board with this stand up paddleboard pet traction mat. The specialized mat fits any type of board and provides your pet with a stable and non slippery surface to stand on while riding.

posts.title: Captain America Shield Nightlight
posts.content: Give your offspring a glimmer of hope against nighttime terrors with the Captain America shield nightlight. The Captain has used his super strength to thrust his trusty shield into the wall and shine bright all night long.

posts.title: Smart Phone App Magnets
posts.content: Upgrade the look of your fridge, microwave, or any one dimensional home device to look like an app filled <del>iPhone</del> smart phone with these smart phone app magnets. A cool novelty gift idea for geeks, this magnet package comes with eighteen eye catching app magnets.

posts.title: Pac-Man Ghost Poncho
posts.content: The retro Pac-Man ghost poncho will thrill and terrify your friends who are dressed like Pac-Man. This ghost poncho is shaped just like a ghost from the old school video game that you loved wasting quarters on as a kid. As a bonus, it repels rain pretty well.

posts.title: Shark Attack Blanket
posts.content: Who would have ever thought being bitten by a great white could feel so good? This shark attack blanket is made from ultra soft double-sided minky fabric and creates the illusion you’re being eaten alive when you wrap yourself up.

posts.title: The Simple Shower
posts.content: Stay clean while you’re roughing it outdoors by bringing along the Simple Shower. This ultra portable device weighs only 2 ounces and instantly turns most standard 1 or 2 liter plastic bottles into an overhead shower that you can use anywhere.
